mapper.select: SELECT distinct(nation_nm) FROM country ORDER BY nation_nm LIMIT ${start}, ${limit};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM country WHERE (nation_nm, std_day) in ( SELECT nation_nm, max(std_day) as std_day FROM country WHERE date(std_day) = date(#{stdDay}) AND nation_nm = #{countryName} GROUP BY nation_nm ) ) AS temp GROUP BY nation_nm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO country (insert_date, seq, area_nm, area_nm_en, area_nm_cn, nation_nm, nation_nm_en, nation_nm_cn, nat_def_cnt, nat_death_cnt, nat_death_rate, std_day, create_dt, update_dt) VALUES(NOW(), #{seq}, #{areaNm}, #{areaNmEn}, #{areaNmCn}, #{nationNm}, #{nationNmEn}, #{nationNmCn}, #{natDefCnt}, #{natDeathCnt}, #{natDeathRate}, #{stdDay}, #{createDt}, #{updateDt})
